programme.desc: Feral Friends / Don't Wake Patrick! - A strange moon turns everyone in town into wild animals, and Sandy's the only one who can save them! // Patrick's sleepwalking, and SpongeBob can't wake him up!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Harl Hubbs Day / Ann They're Off - It's Harl Hubbs Day and Harl decides to help the whole city but quickly discovers he wasn't prepared for Harl mania! // Billy's mother, Ann, accepts a junkyard race challenge against the city's street racing legend, Tread Octane.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Parker Gets Rich / Ultimate Fighting Cloud - After winning a raffle, Parker comes into a large sum of money, which Angus warns will come at a cost. // The Middlemost Post discover a secret backyard wrestling league that challenges both their skills and egos.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep415
programme.desc: World Day - To celebrate 'World Day' and win a trip, the Chipmunks each get a country to represent for a school presentation.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Allergic Reaction - While training for a TV baking competition with Eleanor, Theodore develops an allergy to an unknown ingredient.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Lice-enced to Teach - After a lice outbreak that closes the school, Dave sets up a classroom in the house acting as their teacher.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Animal House Party - When Derek overhears that Alvin and his brothers are alone for the weekend, he plans a wild party at their house.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward!

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Uncle Hambone - When Chapa's little sister needs her help during a city-wide blackout, the rest of Danger Force cross the line as they try to pull her back to power up the Man's Nest and help them win a contest.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep104
programme.desc: House Rules - Thrash is impatient with the family rules and convinces Mo to push boundaries. But when a Decepticon needs their help, Mo and Thrash find themselves playing by a far more dangerous set of rules.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Dream Catcher - The crew has their first away mission on an undiscovered planet that manifests their deepest desires, only to realize the planet has desires of its own.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Along Came a Sister / Chore and Peace - Lincoln is given the responsibility of taking home his classes’ tarantula, but it gets loose and wreaks havoc! // Thinking he has the worst chores, Lincoln decides to go on strike until someone will swap chores with him.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Valentine's Day of Horror - Nate has decided this Valentine's Day, he will finally profess his love for his dream girl in the form of a grand gesture, but the day of love quickly turns into a nightmare after Nate's "gift" gives the entire school food poisoning.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep116
programme.desc: Squid's Visit / To SquarePants or Not to SquarePants - SpongeBob wants to have Squidward visit him at home, but Squidward won't come over, especially when he's perfectly comfortable in his own home // All of SpongeBob's square pants have shrunk in the dryer and the store is all out of square pants!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep100
programme.desc: Banned in Bikini Bottom / Stanely S. Squarepants - Miss Priss, who is against all things fun and delicious, has Krabby Patties banned from Bikini Bottom! // When Stanley, SpongeBob’s klutzy cousin, comes to visit Bikini Bottom, he quickly turns SpongeBob’s life upside down.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep102
programme.desc: BURT! The Musical / Sunday No FunDay - When Angus accidentally throws Burt away, he and Parker must get him back from Greenwood's Recycle King. // After Angus tells Parker and Russell to leave the house on his day off, Parker wrongly assumes it's permanent.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep422
programme.desc: A Star is Scorned / Senior Moment - Lori regrets everything she hasn't done in high school, and vows to make up for lost time in her senior year. // When Lola realizes that double the cuteness could help her break into show business, she teams up with Lily.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Wheel and Deal / Feast or Family - Lana wants to win a race car ride-along with her hero, so she and Lincoln enter to compete in a soap box derby. // When Luan must enroll in a culinary class, Dad uses it to share his passion for cooking with one of his kids.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep208
programme.desc: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over - Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sid's Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carl's dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Cloud of the Month / A. Plumber - After receiving the Middlemost Post's 'Cloud of the Month' award, Parker gets a big head about the new title. // After clogging the toilet, Parker calls a plumber-that winds up being Ryan in disguise-to fix the problem.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep115
programme.desc: I Know What You Did Last Mail Off - Parker learns that the mail Drone the cloud accidentally destroyed has come back for revenge. Parker, Lily, and Mayor Peeve team up to stop the zombie mail Drone once and for all.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep99
programme.desc: The Two Faces of Squidward / Spongehenge - Squidward is rushed to the hospital when SpongeBob accidentally slams the door on Squidward’s face. // A very windy day in Bikini Bottom is blowing air through SpongeBob's holes resulting in a chorus of pertty flute-like sounds.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep100

programme.desc: Alice In The Sky/Tiny Guest/Crazy Hide And Seek/Swap-Swap/Travelling Dodo - Alice gets dizzy while climbing the rope during PE, at school. When she goes to Wonderland and finds Lewis repainting the Queen’s castle, she keeps her fear of heights hidden.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep206/Ep218/Ep225/Ep236/Ep248
programme.desc: Don't Bug Me/The Princess Of Play/An Open Book/Balloon Blues/The Long Goodnight - Esme and Roy are playing with Sid and Lucy at the park. But when bugs start crawling on the scene, Sid gets nervous.

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep13/Ep39
programme.desc: Me, Myself, and A.I./Silver Scream - When an artificial intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the gang has to solve the computerised mystery and maybe learn a lesson about relying too much on technology.

programme.title: Bunnicula Ep23/Ep24/Ep63/Ep64
programme.desc: Ghost Pepper/Dating for Dummies/Bunderworld/The Gingerdread Man - After Bunnicula consumes a spicy ghost chilli pepper, he starts burning up everything in sight. But not everything is as it seems, and it's up to Harold and Chester to cool things off.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep14/Ep40
programme.desc: To Bowl Or Not To Bowl/Spread Those Wings And Fly - In a bid to defeat his nemesis at the big bowling tournament, Daffy has to swallow his pride and ask Bugs for help.

programme.title: Mumfie Ep109/Ep110/Ep111/Ep128/Ep129/Ep130/Ep131/Ep132
programme.desc: Story Night/Firefly Day/Woodpecker's Companion/Silly Mumfie/We Must Decide/Incredible Jellybean/A Very Difficult Customer/Blackout - Boo Whale has decided to organise a late-night storytelling party. She advises everyone to take a midday nap but it is not easy to go to sleEp.when you are told to.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep103/Ep115/Ep129/Ep146/Ep111/Ep126/Ep140/Ep148
programme.desc: Bunnies In The Middle/Army Of Fluffies/Ball And Rocket/Rain Race/Beach Ballet/Bunny Ball Hockey/Night Visitor/Jumping Lessons - In the Jungle, Bop and Boo play catch with Boo's bright orange carrot-ball, as two curious MONKEY sisters, Chika and Chuka, swing down from the trees.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep106/Ep116/Ep125/Ep136/Ep150
programme.desc: Pterodactyl-Doodle-Doo/Miguel’S Compy Conundrum/Lost Dinosaur/Strife In The Fast Lane/Dino Ranch Rocks - Miguel's creation of a new roost for Pteddy results in some unintended consequences.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings Ep156/Ep82/Ep80/Ep84/Ep88/Ep89/Ep87
programme.desc: Hocus Pocus Lemmingus/Ice And Bears/Carried Away Bear/Fountain Of Bear Youth/Lemmings Kit/Timeless Bear/Irresistible Bear - The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep78/Ep2/Ep3/Ep4/Ep5/Ep13/Ep7
programme.desc: Slippery when wet/The Cone Of Shame/Skate Pool/Go Fetch/Robot-Attack/Agent 000/Chickie's Return - The Mikkelsens' house has been cleaned and the floor polished. Unfortunately, the filthy racoons sneak in to steal from the house and wreak havoc.

programme.title: Talking Tom And Friends Ep12/Ep503/Ep16/Ep516/Ep13
programme.desc: Movie Star Angelo/Smash The Trash/The Cursed Game/Tom The Guru/The Secret Life of Ms Vanthrax - Talking Angela's favourite superhero is getting her own movie. But when the director says the role will be played by a guy, Angela disguises herself as a dude to get the part.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Tales Ep1B/Ep15B/Ep4C/Ep17C/Ep8A/Ep21A/Ep11C/Ep24C
programme.desc: Doggone Hill Hog/I Dream of Meanie/Tomcat Jetpack/Jungle Love/Way Off Broadway/Bend It Like Thomas/Prehisterics/Flamenco Fiasco - When bully Spike takes over Tom and Jerry's sledding hill, the two partners team up for a trick that backfires, landing the three at home to recuperate.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Theatricals Ep29/Ep35/Ep91/Ep102/Ep17/Ep120/Ep28/Ep50
programme.desc: Fit To Be Tied/Happy Go Ducky/Royal Cat Nap/Southbound Duckling/Cue Ball Cat/Trap Happy/Fine Feathered Friend/Just Ducky - The mayor issues a leash law and Jerry's proctetor, Spike, is tied to his dog house. Tom takes advantage off this until the law has been revoked and Tom is put on a leash.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep16/Ep57/Ep85/Ep62/Ep102
programme.desc: No Day Like Snow Day/Beep/Too Cool/Safety First/The Unikingdom Awards - When a blizzard hits the town, Master Frown tries to ruin everyone's fun by pretending to be a magical snowman!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep117/Ep159/Ep201/Ep124/Ep165
programme.desc: Puffdora's Box/Musclecup/Small World: Maze Daze - Part 3/Once Upon a Townsville/Take Your Kids to Dooms Day - When Blossom gets overzealous with spring cleaning, she accidentally unleashes a group of evil spirits.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep3/Ep16
programme.desc: The Krakken/Framed - While stopped at a lakefront campsite, Ben has a chance encounter with a Loch Ness-type sea monster called a Krakken.

programme.title: Chowder Ep8B/Ep29B/Ep18B/Ep49A
programme.desc: A Taste of Marzipan/The Trouble With Truffles/The Meach Harvest/Gazpacho - When Mung and Ms. Endive unveil the same dish at Marzipan City's biggest food fair, it's an all out war to decide whose is better.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep28/Ep45
programme.desc: Hiccy-Burp/I Only Have Surprise For You - Bloo desperately tries to get rid of his hiccups.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep1A/Ep53A/Ep105A/Ep4A/Ep56A/Ep108A/Ep7A/Ep60A
programme.desc: Buddha Bugs/Pigmallian/Sir Littlechin And The Giant/The Bigfoot in Bed/Sam and the Bullet Train/North Pole Position/White House Wabbit/Lucky Duck - After pillaging a monastery, Yosemite Sam attempts to outwit an enlightened Bugs Bunny to receive the treasure of a lifetime.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep1B/Ep53B/Ep105B/Ep4B/Ep57A/Ep108B/Ep7B/Ep60B
programme.desc: Now and Zen/Bugs the Gladiator/The Wrong Brothers/World Wide Wabbit/Love is in the Hare/Papa's Got A Brand New Sam/Bugsbarian/Free Range Foghorn - Squeaks finds himself up against a small group of ninjas. Bugs has to come to the rescue.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep2A/Ep54A/Ep106A/Ep5A/Ep58A/Ep109A/Ep8A/Ep61A
programme.desc: The Inside Bugs/A Duck in the Penthouse/Weiner Lose/For the Love of Acorns/Bigs Bunny/Lifestyles of the Wealthy and Obnoxious/Not Lyin' Lion/Love It Or Survivalist It - Yosemite Sam hopes to make a quick escape from a bank heist, and is surprised to discover Bugs as his getaway driver.

programme.title: Batwheels Ep1
programme.desc: Batwheels: Holiday On Ice - Frustrated by the Batwheels’ distracting affinity for holiday festivities, Batwing decides to “go solo” to thwart Mr. Freeze’s evil Christmas-time plots.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Looneyburg Lights Ep1
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders: Looneyburg Lights - The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep3A/Ep55A/Ep107A/Ep6A/Ep59A/Ep110A/Ep9A/Ep62A
programme.desc: St. Bugs and the Dragon/Knight and Duck/The Meanie and the Genie/The Grim Rabbit/Porky the Disorderly/State Fair and Balanced/Wabbit's Wild/Best Bugs - Sir Littlechin the Kinight is on a quest to capture a dragon, but not if Bugs has anything to do with it.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep3B/Ep55B/Ep107B/Ep6B/Ep59B/Ep110B/Ep9B/Ep62B
programme.desc: Leaf It Alone/The Color of Bunny/In Cold Fudd/The Wringer/Game, Set, Wabbit/Pussyfoot Soldier/All Belts are Off/Lewis & Pork - Wile E. Coyote attempts to show Bugs the future of yard maintenance, with limited results.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep7/Ep17/Ep29/Ep36/Ep47
programme.desc: Flea Jump/The Pastry-Making Painters/Cutie-Twee Safari/Memory Loss/How To Train Your Cat - Alice catches fleas from her cat Echo! Her dad wants to treat them with lemon juice but the little girl takes off to Wonderland to ask Lewis for an alternative remedy.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep207/Ep219/Ep226/Ep237/Ep249
programme.desc: Throw And Tell/Sound Reasoning/So Long Stuff/Tillie Unplugged/Best Day Ever - Esme and Roy arrive at the Ooga house, ready for a fun day with baby Fig. But things get tricky when Fig starts throwing everything in sight.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep11A/Ep63A/Ep111A/Ep12B/Ep64B/Ep112B/Ep14A/Ep66A
programme.desc: Bugs Vs. Snail/Daffy the Stowaway/Quack to the Future/Scarecrow/Timmmmmmbugs/DarkBat/Hareplane Mode/Hoarder Up - Bugs is looking forward to a day of kite flying, but first he must make it out his front door when he's stuck inside with a gratuity-wanting delivery snail.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep11B/Ep63B/Ep112B/Ep13A/Ep65A/Ep113A/Ep15A/Ep66B
programme.desc: To Catch a Fairy/Superscooter 3000/DarkBat/Painter Paint Hare/Easter Bunny Imposter/Yosemite Samson/Big Troubles/Cougar, Cougar - Bugs wakes up to discover his teeth missing. He must go head to head with an ornery tooth fairy to get them back.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep12A/Ep64A/Ep113A/Ep13B/Ep65B/Ep113B/Ep15B/Ep67A
programme.desc: Bugs in the Garden/Hoggin' the Road/Yosemite Samson/The Spy Who Bugged Me/Easter Tweets/Puppy's Got Claws/Manner Maid/The Wedding Quacksher - Bugs and Wile compete in a garden grow off! It's nature versus SCIENCE! May the best man win!

programme.title: Mumfie Ep117/Ep118/Ep119/Ep136/Ep137/Ep138/Ep139/Ep140
programme.desc: The Singers/A Surprise For Black Cat/King Kaleb's Mug/The Lighthouse/The Great Crossing Of The Island/A Little Joke/The Imaginary Illness/A Clean Bay - When Mumfie discovers Pinkey singing beautifully all on her own, he suggests that she sing for everyone down on the beach. Black Cat believes that 'king' Kaleb is the best singer.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep104/Ep116/Ep130/Ep147/Ep110/Ep125/Ep139/Ep147
programme.desc: Carrot Racer/Queen Of The Mountain/Sea Rescuers/Three Challenges/First Snow/Chefs/Let's Roar!/Three Challenges - In the Savannah, Jeff the GIRAFFE invites Bop and Boo to play with his toy racetrack.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep107/Ep117/Ep126/Ep137/Ep151
programme.desc: The Long Way Home/The Ten Gallon Trophy/The Dino Doldrums/Ranch-A-Pal-Ooza/Tall In The Saddle Drive - Jon learns that shortcuts aren't always shorter when the Ranchers get lost in the badlands with the hungry Thunderfoot on their trail.

programme.desc: Bugsfoot/A Duck in the Aquarium/Driving Miss Daffy/Snow Wabbit/10-4 Good Bunny/Rhoda's Road House/Computer Bugs/Sir Littlechin and the Kraken - Bugs attempts the path less traveled, and finds himself in yet another stand-off between the Hazmats and Bigfoot.

programme.title: New Looney Tunes Ep16B/Ep68B/Ep114B/Ep18B/Ep70B/Ep116B/Ep20B/Ep72B
programme.desc: Grim on Vacation/The BreezeHammer/Second Fiddle/Aromatherapest/Gold Medal Wabbit/Claire de Loon/Oils Well that Ends Well/Crouching Porky, Hidden Daffy - The Grim Rabbit takes a vacation only to discover Bugs is there, too. programme.desc: Carrot Before the Horse/Quantum Sheep/Point Beak/Raising Your Spirits/Cyrano de Bugs/Daffy Duck: Motivational Guru/Your Bunny Or Your Life/King Nutininkommen - A entitled little girl named Pampreen takes all of Bugs carrots for her prize pony Puddin. programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep17
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded

programme.title: Siaran Langsung: Anugerah Bolasepak Kebangsaan 2022 (ABK22)
programme.desc: Anugerah Bolasepak Kebangsaan (ABK 2022): Upacara menyampaikan Anugerah kepada pemain dan jurulatih di atas persembahan yang telah mereka pamerkan sepanjang musim 2022. 16 kategori anugerah telah dinilai penuh terperinci oleh ahli panel pemilih yang terdiri daripada kumpulan individu berwibawa, termasuk bekas pemain, jurulatih serta di kalangan ahli2 industri dalam bolasepak tempatan. Jangan ketinggalan merasai debarannya untuk mengetahui siapakah yang terbaik di kalangan yang terbaik bagi musim 2022!
